name: Record Label Tycoon
description:
Get a #1 song and make lots of money!

You lose the game if you lose all your money. Don't go below $0!!!

Sign new artists. Hire producers. Go to the write song tab to write a hit song. Go to the management tab to release unreleased songs and make money. You can also market the song to get more hype!

Every artist and producer has a specialized genre. Make sure to match artists and producers who have to same genre. And write songs in those same genres to make hits!
